question: Are you available on Thursdays @ 7PM?
Are you available on Saturday, February 8th from 9am to 4pm?
Are you available on Sunday, March 9th from 9am to 4pm?
Tell me/us about yourself?
Why do you want to join AKPsi?
At Recruitment, who was your most memorable conversation with, and what was it about?
Could you describe a challenging experience or time that led to significant personal growth for you?
What is your biggest strength? How do you see that playing into Alpha Kappa Psi?
Can you provide an example of a time when you changed your actions in order to create a more inclusive environment? What was your biggest challenge in this and how did you grow from it?
Could you share an experience where you truly understood the importance of service?
Brotherhood is a core value of AKPsi. How would you contribute to strengthening this aspect of the organization?

Scenario question (pick ONE based on what you think we need more depth in OR what Miroboard says we need more on)
Social: If you could bring one unique tradition or value from your personal background to AKPsi, what would it be and why?
Professional: Describe a time when you worked to achieve a difficult goal. How do you see AKPsi helping you grow in your ability to lead in the future?
(Fun one) What’s your go-to karaoke song? Why?
If there was one thing you could change about Georgia Tech, what would it be?
If there were 3 items you would take with you to a deserted island, what would you take and why?
What’s the most adventurous or out-of-the-box thing you’ve ever done?
Name a person who inspires you and why?
If you had 24 hours to live, what would be your ideal 24 hours?
